text: A nice feel-good track, one of many in this great soundtrack. It's funny because the game itself almost felt like a dream when I played it back then, but here we are 13 years later and it still sticks with me.
author: SupraDarky

text: I would like to have this game,it looks interesting.
author: Migdo14

text: It's been 13 years god, I anticipated and played this on release. The occasional song upload here is the only time i ever hear it brought up.
author: MultiMrBored

text: Thank you so much for introducing me to this excellent soundtrack!

text: Still got this game since I was a kid, sometimes I take out my ds and play it a little
author: Carlos Javier

text: Really relaxing, thank you
author: 974Ling

text: Man the DS era was so good for me, it was my first handheld console and I couldn't believe the amount of games it has. It was month after month of great releases and new IP's. Thanks to it I got to know Phoenix Wright, Professor Layton, Ghost Trick and so on.
author: LightyGab

text:
yes yes yes!!! i am obsessed with this song, I heard this originally in one of 'VideoGameMusicPlaylists' playlists for studying (which is now on SuperRedGames's channel) and the song really just stuck to me and it is the sole reason why i ever bought the game.
this song is really special to me and i am so happy that you have uploaded this
